mdRecord.dcterms:description: Unattributed line from To Kill a Mockingbird, by Harper Lee, describing Jem's broken arm at 13 years old; another graffiti responds to this line with a memory of the writer's own teenage love life. Someone's initials. Marijuana (pot). Along bottom, second half of punishment graffiti from previous entry; another graffiti responds in agreement to this one. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
"When he was nearly 13, my brother Jem got his arm badly broken at the elbow."â†’ I had my first love | KRW C/O 17 | That would take a lot of pot... | talk in Stacks should be stoned to death. yeah!
